'''40''' (''[[2009â2010 figure skating season|2009â2010]]'') |combined total= 137.47 |combined date= [[2009 World Junior Figure Skating Championships|2009 World Juniors]] |SP score= 49.50 |SP date= [[2009 TrophÃ©e Eric Bompard]] |FS score= 88.37 |FS date= [[2009 World Junior Figure Skating Championships|2009 World Juniors]] }} '''Marissa Castelli''' (born August 20, 1990 in [[Providence, Rhode Island]]) is an [[United States|American]] [[pair skater]]. With partner [[Simon Shnapir]], she is the 2009 [[World Junior Figure Skating Championships|World Junior bronze medalist]] and 2009 [[United States Figure Skating Championships|U.S. junior bronze medalist]]. Castelli and Schnapir began training together in earnest in June 2006. They placed 6th at the [[2008-2009 ISU Junior Grand Prix Final]]. Castelli has also competed as a [[single skating|single skater]]. == Programs == (with Shnapir) {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! Season !
